ThingDef.label: Explosive Dawn Shot
ThingDef.description: A ball of flame launched by a conflagrator

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Explosive Shock
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Immediatly shoot an explosive projectile at the target.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Revenant Shadow
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Summon a revenant shadow, the caster will become invisible for 5 hours, the shadow lasting for that duration.

ThingDef.label: Explosive Dawn Shot
ThingDef.description: A ball of flame launched by a conflagrator

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Explosive Dawn
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Immediatly shoot an explosive projectile at the target.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: King of hearts
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Immediatly launch a grenade dealing 50 points of damage and ignoring 50% of the target's armor.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Jack in the box
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Buries a mine (lasts forever) in a walkable tile within 8 tiles of the user the mine will detonate when an enemy steps over it.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: D12
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Places bombs on enemies within AOE range of this psycast, the bombs will detonate instantly.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: The Past Lingering
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Grants additional defensive capabilities to nearby allies, excluding self.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: The Future Elusive
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: All allies in range will obtain the Inspiration hediff granting bonus damage to their attacks (Excluding the caster). Enemies in range will obtain the Discouragement hediff weakening their attacks.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: The Present Reconstructed
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: All allies in range will obtain the Regeneration hediff granting them increased healing (Caster Included). Enemies in range will obtain the Stagnation hediff, nullifying their ability to heal from wounds.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Ying Xiao - Fleeting Night
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: ATK +50%, -10% Incoming damage, ATK speed x2.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Ying Xiao - Shadowless
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Immediately attacks the target in front of the caster 10 times for 30 damage per slash. Afterwards, this pawn will deal double melee damage for 6 hours.

DamageDef.Name: CutBaseTRUEDMGSTNL
DamageDef.label: slash
DamageDef.deathMessage: {0} has been cut to death by true damage.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Wrathful Cerulean Flame
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: All allied units on the battlefield gain +14% ATK and will take -14% incoming damage.

DamageDef.Name: ArtsDOTSTNL
DamageDef.label: arts
DamageDef.deathMessage: {0} has been cut to death by arts damage.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Shadow Raid
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: This attack deals Arts DOT to the target for a short time.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Murky Night
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: +50% ATK SPD, gain invisiblity for an hour.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Solitary Return
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Deploy a Shadow Sentry to a location of your choosing, the sentry will slow down anyone passing nearby and will last for 2 hours. Additionally obtain 110% ATK bonus for a duration of 1 hour.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: DEF Up
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: x0.40% incoming damage for an hour.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Crag Splitter
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: The next attack will temporarily grant regeneration to the caster and deal 50 damage to the target.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Bloodline of Desecrated Earth
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Upon skill activation, this pawn does not take damage for 30 seconds and caps the movement speed of surrounding enemies to 20% for that duration.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Passive (Self): Booster Injection
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Obtain faster immunity gain and healing speed.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Healing Up
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Grant increased healing factor to the target for 12 Hours.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Medical Drone
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Deploy a Medical Drone to a location of your choosing, the drone will heal anyone nearby and will last for a duration of 6 hours.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Creed
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: ATK +67%; ATK SPD +20% to self.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Auto Protect
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: This ability will slowly heal the target and grant them a barrier that lasts for 3 hours, the barrier will reduce incoming damage by 35%.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Creed Field
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Caster: ATK +40%. Allies: DEF +30%. Duration: 3 Hours.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Focus Support
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Restores the target's psyfocus for 2 hours.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Inheritance of Faith
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Allow targets in the area of effect to regenerate psyfocus and heal slightly for 2 hours.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Glorious Banner
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Inflict enemies within the area of effect with a movement speed debuff which caps their SPD to 70%, additionally x2 stagger duration for 3 hours.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Summon: Mon3tr
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Summon Mon3tr.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Command: Structural Fortification
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Self: +50% DEF. Mon3tr: +30% DEF.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Command: Tactical Coordination
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Self: +60% ATK SPD, Mon3tr: +25% ATK.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Command: Meltdown
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Mon3tr: ATK x2, DEF +60%, HP Regen over time.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Smoke and Mirrors
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: ATK +50%, 40% Melee dodge chance increase.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Smokebomb Blast
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Render any nearby ally invisible, including yourself for two hours.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Smokescreen Execution
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Melee ATK +500%, SPD +25% and invisible until an attack is used or the duration runs out.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Marksman's proficiency
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Ranged ATK SPD +70%.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Armor Breaker
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Target: +30% Incoming DMG.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Armor Breaker - Spread
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Target: +35% Incoming DMG. Stacks with the previous skill.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Pursuit
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Enemies in range will suffer from 70% max movement speed and damage over time.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Endowment
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Self: ATK +60%. Enemies: Movement SPD capped to 60% + Damage over time.

VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: Descent
VEF.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Self: ATK +20%, ATK SPD +50%, +30% Melee dodge chance, slow HP regeneration.
